thread.section_title: Holiday Inn Paris Gare de Lyon Bastille - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Easy access and of attractive location
thread.title_full: Easy access and of attractive location - Review of Holiday Inn Paris Gare de Lyon Bastille, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Rida C
title: Easy access and of attractive location
text:
Quite, clean and cosy hotel.
Several types of public transport almost at door step. LE-Bus takes you directly from airport to the location.
Nice old style building, several restaurants and grocery stores within 50-100m.
My personal recommendation for hotel management is to consider the following:
1) conditioner and body milk or moisturizer. I found it strange for those to be not standard items.
2) Water bottle placed only first time, I'm sure its not that expansive to habe them placed everyday.
